flawed_nl_solution:
The area of the largest room is 45 ft x 30 ft = <<45*30=1350>>1350 sq ft
The area of the smallest room is 15 ft x 8 ft = <<15*8=120>>120 sq ft
The difference between the two is 1350 sq ft - 120 sq ft = <<1350-120=1320>>1320 sq ft
#### 1320

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1230, not 1320. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
